innhold.avsnitt: You must take the first 6 weeks of the parental benefit immediately following the birth. These weeks cannot be combined with work or holidays. The final 9 weeks can be taken immediately following this or be saved for later.
If you adopt, you can take your share at any time after care of the child is assumed.
If you are so sick that you are completely dependent on assistance for taking care of the child, the father can apply to take over your maternal quota.

You will receive the parental benefit from and including three weeks before the expected date of delivery. You can also take the parental benefit up to 12 weeks prior to the expected date of delivery, but there will then be fewer weeks in the joint period.
